trigger.match: ^You are bleeding for (\d+) health\.$
trigger.name: checking_bleeding_amount__

trigger.match: ^The idea of putting something in your stomach sickens you\.$
trigger.name: checking_eating_anorexia__

trigger.match: ^The hole in your throat prevents you from swallowing\.$
trigger.name: checking_eating_slit_throat__

trigger.match: ^Your throat has been locked\, and thus you cannot swallow\.$
trigger.name: checking_eating_throatlock__

trigger.match: ^Your crushed windpipe inhibits your ability to swallow\.$
trigger.name: checking_eating_windpipe__

trigger.match: ^(?:What is it that you wish to drink\?|You take a long draught of water\, hoping to quench your thirst\.)$
trigger.name: checking_eating_fine__

trigger.match: ^Your lungs are much too constricted to smoke\.$
trigger.name: checking_asthma1__

trigger.match: ^What is it you wish to smoke\?$
trigger.name: checking_asthma2__

trigger.match: ^(?:You are blind and (?:can )?see nothing but darkness|There is nothing noteworthy there for you to read)\.$
trigger.name: checking_blindness__

trigger.match: ^(?:Number of matching objects\: 0 \(out of \d+ total\)|You concentrate hard on breaking through your delusions\.)$
trigger.name: checking_dementia__

trigger.match: ^(?:You close your eyes\, bow your head\, and empty your mind of all thought|Your mental prowess is already swollen to its maximum)\.$
trigger.name: checking_impatience__

trigger.match: ^You cannot be bothered to do that\, it is too boring\.$
trigger.name: checking_impatience_true__

trigger.match: ^Paralysed as you are\, your body is not able to pick up anything\.$
trigger.name: checking_paralysis1__

trigger.match: ^I see no \"paralysis" to take\.$
trigger.name: checking_paralysis2__

trigger.match: ^(?:Galt is not currently an enemy of yours|You declare that Galt will no longer be one of your enemies)\.$
trigger.name: checking_paranoia__

trigger.match: ^You must have two good legs to do that\.$
trigger.name: checking_standing_hemiplegy__

trigger.match: ^You are unable to stand with your legs locked\.$
trigger.name: checking_standing_leglock__

trigger.match: ^You are too tangled up to do that\.$
trigger.name: checking_standing_roped__

trigger.match: ^You are shackled and cannot do that\.$
trigger.name: checking_standing_shackled__

trigger.match: ^(?:You stand straight up|You stand up and stretch your arms out wide)\.$
trigger.name: checking_standing_fine__

trigger.match: ^Your locked throat prevents you from speaking\.$
trigger.name: checking_throatlock1__

trigger.match: ^You are \d+ years old\.$
trigger.name: checking_aeon1__

trigger.match: ^You have no arms\!$
trigger.name: checking_severed_arms1__

trigger.match: ^(?:What is it that you wish to drink\?|You take a long draught of water\, hoping to quench your thirst\.)$
trigger.name: checking_severed_arms2__
